title: tests/end-to-end/event/status.phpt fails on GitHub Actions

labels.name: type/build-automation
labels.description: Issues related to PHPUnit's build automation (GitHub Actions, etc.)

labels.name: type/tests
labels.description: Tests! Yes, PHPUnit, too, needs tests.

body:
#### GitHub Actions
```
1) /home/runner/work/phpunit/phpunit/tests/end-to-end/event/status.phpt
Failed asserting that string matches format description.
--- Expected
+++ Actual
@@ @@

#### Locally
```
$ ./phpunit --filter status.phpt
PHPUnit 10.0-g9fdd9aad6 by Sebastian Bergmann and contributors.

Runtime:       PHP 8.0.9
